response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its exceptional quality and the unique benefits it offers, I understand its true worth to be $10,000. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $9,500. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects my confidence in the product's ability to meet your needs. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this proposal.", "product_price": 9500}
